name: body break
description:
this is for Brackeys Game jam 2021.1 

controls

if you click on the different parts of the body they will make the numbers go up

the different parts have color coded squares to show which number belongs to which body part. the goal is to not let the body die and let all the different parts of the body work together. you have to do this until the timer in the bottom left goes to zero. have fun
